ai.title: ChatGPT Gets Major Privacy & Data Controls in New Settings Update

translation.title: ChatGPT推出重大隐私和数据控制设置更新
content: OpenAI在最新更新中为ChatGPT添加了更强大的隐私和数据控制功能。用户现在可以更好地管理他们的对话历史记录，并对其数据的使用方式有更多控制权。
这些新功能包括选择性历史记录保存、数据使用偏好设置，以及更清晰的隐私政策说明。这些改进旨在增强用户对其个人信息的控制，同时保持服务的高质量。

vocabulary.example: Privacy is a fundamental human right.
The new system has better security controls.
You can change your privacy settings in the menu.

questions.question: What are the main new features added to ChatGPT in this update?
questions.answer: The main new features include enhanced privacy controls, data management options, and clearer privacy policy explanations.

questions.question: Why did OpenAI make these changes?
questions.answer: OpenAI made these changes to give users more control over their personal information while maintaining service quality.

entertainment.title: Taylor Swift's 'The Tortured Poets Department' Breaks Pre-Save Record

translation.title: 泰勒·斯威夫特《受困诗人部》打破预存记录
content: 泰勒·斯威夫特即将发行的新专辑《受困诗人部》在Spotify上创下了预存量新纪录。
这张专辑预计将在今年4月19日发行，已经获得了数百万粉丝的预存支持，展示了斯威夫特持续增长的全球影响力。

vocabulary.example: The tortured artist spent years perfecting his craft.
She works in the marketing department.
Fans can pre-save the album before its release.

questions.question: When will Taylor Swift's new album be released?
questions.answer: The album will be released on April 19th, 2024.

questions.question: What record did the album break?
questions.answer: The album broke the pre-save record on Spotify.

finance.title: Nvidia's Market Value Surges Past $2 Trillion on AI Boom

translation.title: 英伟达市值在AI热潮推动下突破2万亿美元
content: 在人工智能需求持续增长的推动下，芯片制造商英伟达的市值突破2万亿美元大关。
公司最新的财报显示其AI芯片销售强劲增长，推动股价创下历史新高。这一里程碑使英伟达成为继苹果、微软和沙特阿美之后，全球第四家突破2万亿美元市值的上市公司。

vocabulary.example: The company's stock price surged after the announcement.
The company's value exceeded two trillion dollars.
The tech industry is experiencing a massive boom.

questions.question: What is driving Nvidia's growth?
questions.answer: The growth is driven by strong AI chip sales and increasing demand for artificial intelligence technology.

politics.title: Ukraine Marks Two Years of War as Global Support Wavers

translation.title: 乌克兰战争两周年之际，全球支持出现动摇
content: 乌克兰迎来俄罗斯入侵两周年，同时面临着国际支持减弱的挑战。
随着战争进入第三年，一些西方国家的援助承诺出现延迟，而乌克兰继续呼吁盟友提供更多军事和经济支持。

vocabulary.example: His support began to waver as costs increased.
The invasion began two years ago.
The country sought help from its allies.

questions.question: What anniversary is Ukraine marking?
questions.answer: Ukraine is marking the second anniversary of Russia's invasion.

questions.question: What challenge is Ukraine facing with international support?
questions.answer: Ukraine is facing wavering international support, with some Western countries delaying their aid commitments.
